attributes.action: Nationalise all fuel in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned demand that all Fuel supplies and distribution in the UK should be nationalised
 Since privatisation we have seen constant price increases and the selling of our fuel assets to foreign companies and all for bigger & bigger profits & dividends to the share holders.
 We demand that the goverment place ALL fuels under goverment control. This includes Fossil fuels, Nuclear & Renewables.
 Fuel should be an asset for the people of the UK not a vast money making scheme for a few foreign investors
